At this point,I should see my anime list registered on my account:
Normal Response: https://anilist.co/user/SergioZorrilla/animelist

{"error":{"status":404,"messages":["API route not found."]}}

So, in order no complete the test with the main recruitments, I made Series list in http://myjson.com/pizm1.

Enjoy it.
